committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Housing and Community Development

official_title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to clarify the prohibition on the use of urban development action grants for the relocation of business operations.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to prohibit the use of urban development action grant funds for any project that will facilitate or result in the relocation of any operation, personnel, or position of a business establishment from any city, urban county, or identifiable community that is eligible for such a grant to the project area.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to clarify the prohibition on the use of urban development action grants for the relocation of business operations.
